---
title: "Curated Snapshot Report"
output: pdf_document
params:
  modules: NULL
---

for (mod in params$modules) {
  
  
  
  
  if (!is.null(mod$text)) {
    cat(mod$text, "\n\n")
  }
  
  
  if (!is.null(mod$tables) && length(mod$tables) > 0) {
    
    for (tbl in mod$tables) {
      knitr::kable(tbl)
      cat("\n\n")
    }
  }
  
  
  if (!is.null(mod$plots) && length(mod$plots) > 0) {
    
    for (p in mod$plots) {
      print(p)
    }
  }
}
